requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 200x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
